mapper.sql: id, account_no, trade_type, trade_amount, trade_date, in_or_out, balance, business_no, create_user, create_date, update_user, update_date, remark,
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ms_account_detail VALUES( #{id}, #{accountNo}, #{tradeType}, #{tradeAmount}, #{tradeDate}, #{inOrOut}, #{balance}, #{businessNo}, #{createUser}, now(), #{updateUser}, now(), #{remark} )

insert into ms_account_detail ( id, account_no, trade_type, trade_amount, trade_date, in_or_out, balance, business_no, create_user, create_date, update_user, update_date, remark) values
( #{item.id}, #{item.accountNo}, #{item.tradeType}, #{item.tradeAmount}, #{item.tradeDate}, #{item.inOrOut}, #{item.balance}, #{item.businessNo}, #{item.createUser}, now(), #{item.updateUser}, now(), #{item.remark} )
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(ms_account_detail.trade_amount) FROM ms_account,ms_account_detail WHERE ms_account.account_no = ms_account_detail.account_no AND ms_account.mem_id=#{memId} AND ms_account_detail.in_or_out=1 AND (ms_account_detail.trade_type='FJJL' OR ms_account_detail.trade_type='SCJL')
